recommendations: LinkedIn User ‚ÄúFaisal is a leader far ahead of his age and also charts the currents of a turbulent industry with an ease which belies his age. He is a great communicator and a team player. He has led his peers with consensus and a vision which has enabled him to expand within a quick period of time. It was enriching to work with Faisal for half a year and understand the entrepreneurial journey. ‚Äù

Aamir Mojeeb ‚ÄúFaisal was my mentor during my internship in his startup, BIS Research. He was the one who taught me the meaning of entrepreneurship and who motivated and guided me to put efforts in life. I did work with him for around 5 months and he is indeed a wonderful team leader, a great motivator and a visionary person. He is a perfect example of a leader who pushes his team to achieve something that they think they can't. ‚Äù
